summary: Two boys learn from a mysterious warrior that they are the heirs to the throne of Patusan and set out to overthrow the current monarchy.
cast: Ernie Reyes Sr.|Ernie Reyes Jr.|Nicolas Cowan|John Karlen|Rob Schneider|Oliver Mills|Jonathan Schmock|Neal Israel|Vladimir Parra|Brandon Karrer|Dathon Aragon|Phillip Bayless|Philip Tan|Keone Young|Romy Windsor|Rachel Kolar|Yoni Gordon|Sritao Thepchasoon|Leslie Nielsen|Nathan Jung|Thep Thien-Chai|Sa-Ngud|Sheng Meng|Tanin Tapmongkol|Montatip Kaewprasert|Tone Loc|Rick Dorio|James Vallely|Mitchell Hurwitz|Mark Dutt|Desi Singh|Tad Horino|Young Jue|Kelly Hu|Marisa Theodore|Pete Antico|Robert Terry Lee|Bowman Chung|Kyle Pittman
title: Surf Ninjas
